BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Siting and Maritime Uses

Items.Title: Landmarks Preservation Commission designation no. DL – 358, LP – 2155, pursuant to §3020 of the New York City Charter, concerning the designation of the Douglaston Hill Historic District, located at generally bounded by 43rd Avenue, 243rd Street, 42nd Avenue, 240th Street, Depew Avenue, 40th Avenue and 242nd Street, Borough of Queens, Council District no. 19, as a landmark.  (Non-ULURP no. 20055133 HKQ).
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Landmarks, Douglaston Hill Historic District, Queens (Non-ULURP no. 20055133HKQ)

Items.Title: Application submitted by the New York City School Construction Authority pursuant to Section 1731 of the New York State Public Authorities Law for the proposed site selection of property located at 35-12 35th Street, to construct a 1000-seat high school facility to house the Frank Sinatra School of the Arts.  (Block 639, Lot 16).  Council District no. 26.  (Non-ULURP no. 20055457SCQ)
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: School, The Frank Sinatra School of the Arts, 35-12 35th St, Borough of Queens (20055457SCQ)

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY
